title: Edith Cavell is Tried for Treason
description:
October 7, 1915. During World War One, British nurse Edith Cavell is put on trial for treason for helping hundreds of wounded Allied soldiers escape German territory.

This episode is sponsored by: https://www.policygenius.com/
